results.title: Atenolol treatment of late luteal phase dysphoric disorder.
results.text_hl: Sixteen @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ meeting provisional diagnoses of late luteal phase @DISEASE_Premenstrual_Dysphoric_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D065446 @@@dysphoric disorder@@@ were treated for symptoms of @<m>DISEASE_Premenstrual_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011293 @@@PMS@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (50 mg once daily) in a randomized placebo-crossover double-blind design.

citations.NLM: Rausch JL, Janowsky DS, Golshan S, Kuhn K, Risch SC. Atenolol treatment of late luteal phase dysphoric disorder. J Affect Disord. 1988 Sep-Oct;15(2):141-7. PMID: 2975684
citations.BibTeX: @article{2975684, title={Atenolol treatment of late luteal phase dysphoric disorder.}, author={Rausch JL and Janowsky DS and Golshan S and Kuhn K and Risch SC}, journal={J Affect Disord}, volume={15}, number={2}, pages={141-7}}

results.title: Treatment of a patient with seasonal premenstrual syndrome.
results.text_hl: Treatment of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with seasonal @<m>DISEASE_Premenstrual_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011293 @@@premenstrual syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Parry BL, Rosenthal NE, Tamarkin L, Wehr TA. Treatment of a patient with seasonal premenstrual syndrome. Am J Psychiatry. 1987 Jun;144(6):762-6. PMID: 3296791
